about_the_game:
🍱 This is a demo of Bento Blocks, a puzzle game that combines culinary creativity with brain-teasing challenges. Slice, arrange, and perfect your bento-making skills as you craft delicious lunch boxes at your own pace.

  • 🔪 Discover a fresh take on puzzle games as you slice and arrange ingredients to craft bento boxes.

  • 📔 Solve each puzzle with the fewest cuts to complete your recipe book.

  • 🍣 Discover new challenges and mechanics as you progress through various recipes.

  • 🥢 Explore a selection of hand-crafted levels, each with its own unique twist and satisfying solution.

  • 🧘🏽‍♂️ Unwind with a game that blends culinary arts with cozy and relaxing puzzles.

  • 🎶 Relaxing music and calming visuals.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+) and Windows 10
  • Processor: 1.8 GHz or faster processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Direct X 11.0 compatible video card
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+) and Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.8 GHz or faster processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1070 / AMD Radeon RX 5500 XT
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
